Actions.Text: COMMITTEE DISCHARGED AND COMMITTED TO RULES

Title: Directs the commissioner of education to require public schools to report on compliance with art education instruction requirements
Summary: Directs the state education commissioner to require public school districts to report on compliance with art education instruction requirements.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to directing the commissioner of education to require public school districts to report on compliance with art education instruction requirements
